name: Quality Assurance Engineer
description:
We're looking for talented QA Engineer to work on our ongoing project.

Required skills:

· 3+ years hand-on experience in software testing;
· !Postman! Experience in API Automation Testing (JS + Postman)
· Understanding of client-server architecture;
· Basic knowledge of HTML/CSS and SQL;
· Strong understanding of software testing concepts, methodologies;
· Experience in creating/maintaining testing documentation;
· Design, implement, and execute test cases
· Ability to work as a team player;
· Fast learning skills;
· Intermediate English (read / write)

Additional skills are plus:

· Experience in mobile applications testing
· Basic knowledge of JavaScript
· Experience in Automation Testing (Selenium WebDriver)

What we provide:

· Office in center of Minsk with friendly team ;)
· Ability to grow using modern tools and technologies
· Good salary, vacation time, sick days
